posts.post_content:
I like my women like I like my grizzly bears. Low cost, classy, mature, and capable of punching tree's in half.  
  
[runeclaw bear](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=runeclaw bear) is just too young, flashy(look at those tattoos), and not punching trees in two.

runeclaw bear is just too young, flashy(look at those tattoos), and not punching trees in two.

posts.post_content: The measurement stick by which many creatures are measured. 8 bears can take on [Emrakul, the Aeons Torn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emrakul, the Aeons Torn), while [Grand Arbiter Augustin IV](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grand Arbiter Augustin IV) can win a wrestling match with a bear.

posts.post_content:
**"Don't try to outrun one of Dominia's Grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you."**   
   
The Old flavour text was brilliant.

The Old flavour text was brilliant.
